comments:
There are some problems between data explorer and report viewer on my installation.

Installed birt version:
Version: 1.0.0
Build id: 200506010811

Installed eclipse version:
Version: 3.0.1.1
Build-ID: 200410121820

I'm using a simple mysql database with the mysql jdbc connector 3.1.8. The JDBC
driver file is available in the following locations:

eclipse\plugins\org.eclipse.birt.report.data.oda.jdbc_1.0.0\drivers\mysql-connector-java-3.1.8-bin.jar

and

eclipse\plugins\org.eclipse.birt.report.viewer_1.0.0\birt\WEB-INF\plugins\org.eclipse.birt.report.data.oda.jdbc\drivers\mysql-connector-java-3.1.8-bin.jar

When I create a data source in the data explorer I'm able to select enter the
jdbc URL and click on the button "test connection". A dialog box opens and tells
me that the database was accessed successfully. When I now try to run a report,
which uses this data source the page contains the following error:

There are errors on the report page:
Error1:Failed to render Table farmlistTable

When I check the log file of the report viewer there is the following error:

14.06.2005 22:58:06 org.eclipse.birt.core.util.BirtTimer logTimeTaken

The report will never run successfully in this session. I shutdown eclipse and
restart the workbench. I open the BIRT perspective and open my report. I don't
use the "test connection" button or accessing the datasource through the data
explorer. When I run the report, the report runs fine. But now the data explorer
seems to be broken. When I try the "test connection" button for my datasource
AFTER running the rport, no dialog will open and giving any informations
regarding success or failure when accessing the datasource.
If I now try to expand my data record an error dialog opens, telling me there
are further errors in the log. If I check the PDE error log, there is the
following entry:

-> Unhandled event loop exception
and a second error giving me the same error like in the viewer log:
class loading constraint violated (class: com/mysql/jdbc/ResultSet method:
getNextResultSet()Lcom/mysql/jdbc/ResultSet;) at pc: 0

The detailed exception for the "test connection" button is:

I cannot access the data source in the data explorer until next restart. After
restart I've the possibility to use the data exporer OR the viewer engine. The
first started plugin loads the driver, the second started plugin is unable to
load the driver.... It's a little bit frustrating becoming an expert in
restarting the eclipse workbench ;-)

I can not reproduce this bug. Following is my test environment:

BIRT: N20050618
http://download.eclipse.org/birt/downloads/build.php?build=N-R1-N20050618-
200506180700

Eclipse: 3.0.1
http://download.eclipse.org/eclipse/downloads/drops/R-3.0.1-
200409161125/index.php

MySQL: 3.1.8
http://dev.mysql.com/downloads/connector/j/3.1.html

No other driver in drivers folder except MySql.

Please design a simplest report to see whether this problem still exists in 
your machine. Thanks.
